SEARCH
Package utils

Class ColorUtils

java.lang.Object
utils.ColorUtils
public class ColorUtils extends Object
ColorUtils class providing ANSI color codes for terminal output. Supports colorful terminal display with Turkish character encoding.
Version:
1.0
Author:
CMPE-343 Project Group

    • colorize

      public static String colorize(String text, String color)
      Colorizes a string with the specified color.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to colorize
      color - The ANSI color code
      Returns:
      Colorized string

    • colorize

      public static String colorize(String text, String color, String style)
      Colorizes a string with color and style.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to colorize
      color - The ANSI color code
      style - The ANSI style code
      Returns:
      Colorized and styled string

    • colorize

      public static String colorize(String text, String color, String bgColor, String style)
      Creates a colored and styled text with background.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to colorize
      color - The ANSI color code
      bgColor - The ANSI background color code
      style - The ANSI style code
      Returns:
      Colorized, styled string with background

      Parameters:
      length - The length of the line
      character - The character to use
      color - The color of the line

    • printLine

      public static void printLine()
      Prints a horizontal line with default settings (60 characters, '=', CYAN).
